title: Star Trek/Legion of Super-Heroes
description: IDW Publishing and DC Comics are proud to present the greatest tale of the 23rd century!Or is that the 31st century? As you'll see here, it's both! Eisner-nominated writer Chris Roberson and Star Trek and Legionnaires veteran artist Jeffrey Moy partner up to bring you the most bizarre partnership of any century! The crew of the Starship: Enterprise and the Legion of Super-Heroes come face to face as they deal with a changed history and timeline that neither knows the cause of. Traveling to the past and the future to find answers, both teams must work together to set things right.
author: Chris Roberson
